column1: IN THE COURT OF APPEAL OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST REPUBLIC
In the matter of an application for mandates
in the nature of a writ of Prohibition, a writ
of  Certiorari  and  a  writ  of  Mandamus  in
terms of Article 140 of the Constitution of the
Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.
1.  S. W. P. P.A. Chintha Lalani
